query: SELECT id, clientId, status, emailCode, authCode, createdAt FROM verificationSessions WHERE clientId = (SELECT id FROM clientLoginData WHERE email = 'teste3@example.com' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1;
